samples.current_output: Aamam. PSG Tech, Kumaraguru, SITRA-la textile technology courses irukku. Tirupur textile hub kitta irukradhunala internship, placement opportunities niraiya. Industry exposure kedaikum.

samples.instruction: NEET-aa JEE-aa? Doctor-aa Engineer-aa? Eppadi decide panrathu?
samples.current_output: Decision factors: 1) Interest - Patient care vs Problem solving 2) Study style - Memory vs Logic 3) Duration - MBBS 5.5 years vs Engineering 4 years 4) Investment - Medical costlier 5) Lifestyle - Doctor on-call vs Engineer 9-5. Self-assessment: Biology enjoy panreengala = NEET. Maths/Physics enjoy = JEE. Both attempt possible (Science stream). Shadow a doctor and engineer if possible. Final call: Your genuine interest, not family pressure.

samples.instruction: Education loan EMI à®•à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿ à®®à¯à®Ÿà®¿à®¯à®², à®à®©à¯à®© option?
samples.current_output: Options available: 1) Moratorium extension request - bank will consider 2) EMI restructuring - lower EMI, longer tenure 3) Interest only payment temporarily 4) Parent co-borrower support 5) Government interest subsidy scheme check 6) Loan transfer to lower interest bank 7) Part-time income for EMI contribution. Don't do: Default silently - affects CIBIL score. Do: Communicate with bank proactively. Recovery harassment: Banking Ombudsman complaint.

samples.current_output: Emergency options: 1) HDFC ECSS - crisis support â‚¹75,000 2) PM CARES (COVID affected) 3) Chief Minister's Public Relief Fund - apply to Collector 4) College Student Aid Fund 5) Rotary Club scholarships 6) Lions Club education support. Immediate help: District Social Welfare Officer-à® à®šà®¨à¯à®¤à®¿à®¯à¯à®™à¯à®•à®³à¯. NGOs: Pratham, Smile Foundation. Fee postponement request to college principal.

samples.instruction: TC enge pochu theriyala, duplicate eppadi vaanguvadhu?
samples.current_output: Duplicate TC process: 1) FIR file - nearest police station 2) Newspaper advertisement - TC lost notice 3) School application - with FIR copy, newspaper cutting, affidavit 4) School verifies records, issues duplicate 5) Fees: â‚¹50-200. Time: 1-2 weeks. If school closed: Contact DEO. Old schools: Check EMIS database for records. Important: Keep photocopy of all original certificates always!

Engineering: Govt â‚¹50K/year, Private â‚¹1-2 lakh. Medical: Govt â‚¹13.5K/year, Private â‚¹10-20 lakh. Arts/Science: Govt â‚¹2-5K/year, Private â‚¹20-50K. MBA: Govt â‚¹30-50K/year, Private â‚¹2-5 lakh. ITI: Govt Free, Private â‚¹20-40K. Polytechnic: Govt â‚¹1.5-3K/year, Private â‚¹30-50K.

Board Exams: 10th March, 12th March. NEET: May first week. JEE Main: January & April sessions. TNPSC Group 4: Throughout year. TNEA counselling: June-July. College admissions: June-August. GATE: February. CAT: November. CLAT: December.
